response.job_title: Ingénieur Polytechnicien Student X2019 - 4th year | Industrial Engineering from the UNAL
response.summary:
I consider myself curious, proactive, organized, disciplined and concerned about the performance of the work groups in which I find myself. I am very interested in research applied to industry. For this reason, I want to delve into the theory of Operations Research and Machine Learning applied to fields such as logistics, production and the systematic analysis of information.

At the National University of Colombia, I was able to carry out small projects on simulation and optimization of real manufacturing systems. During my 2nd year at the Ecole Polytechnique, I collaborated on a Quantum Computing project in a group of 5 students supervised by an IBM mathematician.

Regarding research, I was a poster modality speaker at the V International Congress of Industry and Organizations (2018) with a project whose goal was to analyze the influence of the distance to bins on the willingness to participate in waste recycling. For version VI of this event, I participated in the development of a project that was presented that consisted of modeling last-mile deliveries using Crowd logistics.
response.skills: Inteligencia artificial, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Inglés, Gestión de proyectos, Trabajo en equipo, Investigación, Planificación estratégica, Liderazgo de equipos, Francés, Análisis de datos, R (Programming Language), C++, Business Analytics, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Performance Dashboards, Python (Programming Language)

profile_positions.description: Development of a constrained optimization algorithm for the replenishment problem under a monoechelon, multiproduct and multiperiod context.
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description:
- Implementation of indicators to monitor the use of consumables (the inventory output of certain raw materials).
- Development of a Power BI dashboard easily usable by operational teams.
profile_positions.title: Lean Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Internship carried out during the first year of the "Cycle d'Ingénieur" program at the Ecole Polytechnique. The main tasks are presented below:
• Assisting instructors in mathematics courses for high school students
• Support and mentoring of 20+ students: 2nd, 1st and Final-year students
• Organizing a school outing to a vocational orientation event
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Science (B. Sc.) in Industrial Engineering, 4.6/5.0
